paper.title: Regression-Based Complexity Reduction of the Nested Monte Carlo Methods
paper.abstract: In this paper we propose a novel dual regression-based approach for pricing American options. This approach reduces the complexity of the nested Monte Carlo method and has an especially simple form for time discretized diffusion processes. We analyze the complexity of the proposed approach in the case of both fixed and increasing numbers of exercise dates. The method is illustrated by several numerical examples.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是提出了一种基于回归的方法来降低嵌套蒙特卡洛方法的复杂性，并明确提到该方法用于定价美式期权，这属于衍生品定价的范畴。
